attributes.action: Make Healthy School Meals Free for All Children
attributes.background: For some primary school children going into year 3 in september, they will lose their free cooked lunch, for some children this is the only hot food they receive. Regardless of your threshold for houshold income, All children should receive a hot meal at the place they are expected to attend by law.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732029
